oracle.name: Oracle
oracle.commands: oralogon oralogoff oracommit oraroll oraautocom orainfo oramsg oradesc oraldalist oraopen oraclose orasql oracols orabindexec oraplexec orastmlist oraconfig oraexec oralob oralong oramsg oraconfig oradesc orabreak oraparse orabind oraexec orafetch orasql

mssqlserver.name: MSSQLServer
mssqlserver.commands: odbc execute paramtype prepare connection allrows

db2.name: Db2
db2.commands: db2_connect db2_disconnect db2_exec_direct db2_exec_prepared db2_select_direct db2_select_prepared db2_prepare db2_bind_param db2_bind_exec db2_fetchrow db2_finish db2_getnumrows db2_begin_transaction db2_commit_transaction db2_rollback_transaction db2_test

mysql.name: MySQL
mysql.commands: mysql::sel mysqluse mysqlescape mysqlsel mysqlnext mysqlseek mysqlmap mysqlexec mysqlclose mysqlinfo mysqlresult mysqlcol mysqlstate mysqlinsertid mysqlquery mysqlendquery mysqlbaseinfo mysqlping mysqlchangeuser mysqlreceive

postgresql.name: PostgreSQL
postgresql.commands: pg_conndefaults pg_connect pg_disconnect pg_exec pg_select pg_result pg_execute pg_lo_open pg_lo_close pg_lo_read pg_lo_write pg_lo_lseek pg_lo_creat pg_lo_tell pg_lo_unlink pg_lo_import pg_lo_export pg_listen pg_sendquery pg_sendquery_prepared pg_sendquery_params pg_getresult pg_isbusy pg_blocking pg_cancelrequest pg_on_connection_loss pg_escape_string pg_quote pg_escape_bytea pg_unescape_bytea pg_transaction_status pg_parameter_status pg_exec_prepared pg_exec_params pg_notice_handler pg_result_callback pg_encrypt_password pg_lo_truncate pg_describe_cursor pg_describe_prepared pg_backend_pid pg_server_version

mariadb.name: MariaDB
mariadb.commands: maria::sel mariause mariaescape mariasel marianext mariaseek mariamap mariaexec mariaclose mariainfo mariaresult mariacol mariastate mariainsertid mariaquery mariaendquery mariabaseinfo mariaping mariachangeuser mariareceive
